description.name: Knee workshop mat 450x210x30mm
description.long_desc:
Ensure comfort and convenience during work with our workshop knee mat. Made from high-quality, durable foam, the mat provides excellent protection and support for your knees, even during prolonged workshop tasks.


Product Features:



  • High-Quality Foam: The mat is made from durable foam, ensuring long-lasting use and comfort.

  • Dimensions: The mat measures 450x210x30mm, perfectly suited to the needs of any DIY enthusiast.

  • Special Notch: Equipped with a special notch, ideal for storing small tools such as wrenches, sockets, bits, etc., increasing the mat’s functionality.

  • Convenient Handle: The mat features a convenient handle for easy transport and storage.

description.name: Hammer tacker 6-10mm
description.long_desc:
The hammer stapler for 6-10 mm staples is a solid tool that ensures smooth material fastening without the need for manually pressing a trigger. This hammer stapler operates on an impact mechanism: the user makes a quick hand movement, striking the tool against the surface to be stapled. The internal mechanism immediately drives the staple into the material.


Key Features:



  • Precise hammer mechanism – allows for fast and accurate stapling, ideal for working on large surfaces without manual trigger operation.

  • Compatibility with multiple staple sizes (6-10 mm) – provides flexibility in staple choice, depending on material type and project requirements.

  • Ergonomic and durable design – the steel casing enhances durability, while the ergonomic handle reduces fatigue during prolonged use.

  • Ease of use and maintenance – requires no complicated maintenance, and its mechanism allows for quick and easy staple loading.


Technical Specifications:



  • Manufacturer: Geko

  • Staple Size: 6-10 mm

  • Type: Hammer Stapler (no trigger)

  • Construction: Steel, damage-resistant

  • Handle: Ergonomic, non-slip

  • Application: Fastening building materials, upholstery, finishing work


Compared to standard manual staplers, the hammer model stands out for its ease of use and faster operation speed. The impact mechanism enables stapling without the need for continuous hand pressure on a trigger, improving efficiency and reducing hand strain.

description.name: 8pcs drills set for glass and ceramic 3-12mm
description.long_desc:
A precision drill bit set for glass and ceramics is an essential tool for anyone who needs to drill into hard and delicate materials without the risk of damage. Featuring sharp tungsten carbide cutting edges and a HEX shank, this set offers excellent performance, stability, and versatility for both home workshops and professional use.


Product Features:




  • Complete set of 8 drill bits in sizes:
    3 / 4 / 5 / 6 / 7 / 8 / 10 / 12 mm




  • Equipped with four tungsten carbide cutting edges – exceptional durability and accuracy




  • 1/4" HEX shank – compatible with screwdrivers and quick-change chucks




  • Designed for drilling in glass, ceramics, glazed tiles, porcelain, and stoneware tiles




Set Advantages:




  • Perfect for precise drilling without material cracking




  • Four-edge design enables easy centering – no center punch required




  • Quick attachment and release in a screwdriver – thanks to HEX shank




  • Excellent choice for installers, tilers, DIY enthusiasts, and appliance service technicians




Set Includes:




  • 8 drill bits: 3 mm, 4 mm, 5 mm, 6 mm, 7 mm, 8 mm, 10 mm, 12 mm




  • Blister packaging – ideal for display and organized storage




Applications:




  • Drilling holes for wall plugs, brackets, shelves, and bathroom accessories




  • Finishing work on tiles, mirrors, and glass panels




  • Professional and home use – with no risk of chipping or splintering

description.name: 12pcs diamond cutting discs 40mm set
description.long_desc:
Discover unmatched precision and versatility with our 40mm diamond disc set! Ideal for professionals and DIY enthusiasts, this set includes 10 high-quality diamond discs that provide excellent cutting in various materials such as steel, glass, plastic, stone, and many more.


Product Features:



  • Set of 10 Discs: Each disc has a diameter of 40mm, making them perfect for precise cuts.

  • Versatility: Designed for cutting various materials, including steel, glass, plastic, and stone, making them extremely versatile.

  • Mounting Spindles: The set includes 2 mounting spindles, which facilitate the installation of the discs on tools, ensuring stability and safety during work.

description.name: UV Light Insect Killer 20W
description.long_desc:
Get rid of annoying insects once and for all with the Geko UV 20W insect killer lamp! This device lures and effectively neutralizes flying insects by using UV-A radiation that is safe for humans and pets. As a result, your evenings spent on the terrace or in the garden will be free from mosquitoes, flies, and wasps.


The lamp can be hung using the chain included in the set.
We also include a mini brush for cleaning the grid and bulbs. The lamp features a very convenient removable tray for neutralized insects. Simply slide out the tray, dispose of the dead insects, and slide it back in. The tray can also be washed under running water!


Product Features:



  • Efficiency: Special UV bulbs emit ultraviolet waves that effectively attract insects, eliminating them through an electrified grid.

  • Safety: The lamp has external protective grids that prevent accidental electric shocks. It is completely safe for humans and pets.

  • Ease of Use: The convenient, removable tray for dead insects allows for quick emptying and cleaning. The set also includes a mini brush for cleaning the grids and bulbs.

  • Simple Operation: The lamp is easy to maintain and use. Remember to always unplug the device before cleaning. Thanks to its durable construction, it will serve you for a long time, ensuring peaceful evenings free from annoying insects.


Technical Specifications:



  • Manufacturer: Geko

  • Power: 20 W

  • Power Supply: 230V ~50Hz

  • Two UV bulbs that attract insects

  • Central electrified grid neutralizes persistent insects.

  • Two external grids protect against electric shocks. In the presence of children, it is recommended to place the lamp at a height or hang it using the included chain.

  • The insect tray can be easily removed, emptied, and even washed under running water.


Dimensions:



  • Grid dimensions: 36.5 x 18.5 cm

  • Height: 27 cm

  • Length: 41 cm

  • Width: 7 cm


Included in the set:



  • UV 20W insect killer lamp

  • Mini brush for cleaning grids/bulbs

  • Chain for hanging the lamp

  • Instruction manual

description.name: 12V Diesel air heater 2KW
description.long_desc:
We present the 2kW parking heater, perfect for providing warmth and comfort in your vehicle, agricultural machine, boat, or camper trailer. Equipped with an advanced control system, it allows precise temperature regulation and rapid air heating, regardless of weather conditions. Thanks to remote control with the included remote, the heater is extremely convenient and intuitive to operate.


The heater is powered by diesel fuel (EN590 compliant), ensuring energy efficiency and low fuel consumption – only 0.23 to 0.51 liters per hour of operation. This is an ideal solution for those who spend a lot of time on the road, wanting to maintain thermal comfort in the vehicle cabin without having to start the engine.


Key Product Advantages:




  • Efficient Heating Power of 2kW – Effective heating of both the driver’s cabin and other spaces.




  • Easy-to-Use Control Panel – Enables precise temperature regulation.




  • Remote Control – Allows turning on, off, and adjusting settings without physical access to the heater.




  • Low Fuel Consumption – Optimal efficiency ranging from 0.23 to 0.51 L/hour, contributing to operational cost savings.




  • Wide Application in Various Vehicles – Universal use for cars, construction machinery, boats, camper trailers, and many more.




Scope of Application:




  • Motor Vehicles – Ideal solution for all types of cars, including passenger vehicles, vans, trucks, and trailers.




  • Construction and Agricultural Machinery – Ensure comfort during work in harsh weather conditions.




  • Boats, Ships, and Yachts – Efficient cabin heating on vessels significantly enhances travel comfort.




  • Camper Vans – Provide warmth and comfort during outdoor recreation.




Permitted Uses:




  • Windshield Heating – To avoid frost and improve visibility.




  • Heating Driver Cabins, Cargo Areas, and Living Spaces – Suitable for camper vans.




Technical Specifications:



  • Power Supply Voltage: 12 V

  • Fuel: Diesel compliant with EN590

  • Heating Power: 2 kW

  • Hot Air Flow: 50 m3/h

  • Fuel Consumption: 0.23 - 0.51 L/hour

  • Power Consumption: 15-40 W

  • Operating/Storage Temperature: -30? to 55?

  • Operating Altitude: Up to 4300 m above sea level

  • CO2 Emissions: <10%

  • Heater Dimensions: 40 x 13 x 14 cm

  • Heater Weight: 3.3 kg

  • Weight with Accessories: 4.9 kg


The Set Includes:



  • Air heater

  • Remote control

  • Control panel

  • All necessary mounting accessories, including hoses, fasteners, and fuel tank.


The 12V 2kW Car Heater / Parking Heater is designed to provide thermal comfort in vehicles and other spaces requiring heating. Its advanced features and wide range of applications make it an essential piece of equipment for winter travels, fieldwork, or outdoor recreation.

description.name: 12V Diesel air heater 8KW
description.long_desc:
Car Heater / Diesel Parking Heater 12V 8kW with Integrated Fuel Tank


We present the 8kW parking heater, designed to provide maximum thermal comfort on every journey. With an integrated fuel tank and modern design, the device is not only efficient but also convenient for transport and installation. The heater features a control panel that allows precise adjustment of operating parameters, as well as a remote control, ensuring ease of use without the need for direct access to the device.


Powered by EN590 compliant diesel fuel, this high-powered heater is the ideal solution for heating cabin spaces in vehicles, boats, camper trailers, or agricultural machinery. Its efficiency, providing up to 55 m3/h of hot air flow, and low CO2 emissions make it an excellent choice for use in harsh weather and terrain conditions.


Key Product Advantages:




  • Powerful Heating Capacity of 8kW – Perfect for large spaces, ensuring quick and efficient heating.




  • Integrated Fuel Tank – Increases the convenience of installation and use, minimizing the need for additional fuel containers.




  • Easy-to-Use Control Panel – An intuitive display and clear buttons make it easy to adjust settings.




  • Remote Control – Enables full control of the device without the need to leave the vehicle.




  • Economical Fuel Consumption – Between 0.35 to 0.78 L/hour, allowing extended use without frequent refueling.




  • Sturdy Construction – Durable housing and compact size ensure reliability even in extreme conditions.




Application Scope of the Heater:




  • All Types of Motor Vehicles – Ideal for passenger cars, trucks, vans, and off-road vehicles.




  • Construction and Agricultural Machinery – Provides comfortable temperature in work cabins during winter fieldwork.




  • Boats, Yachts, and Ships – Effectively heats cabins and living spaces on vessels.




  • Camper Vans – Provides warm, comfortable conditions during outdoor recreation, even in cold climates.




Permitted Uses:




  • Defrosting Windows – Facilitates rapid defrosting, improving visibility.




  • Heating Driver Cabins, Cargo Areas, and Providing Thermal Comfort – Suitable for camper trailers and yachts.




Technical Specifications:



  • Power Supply Voltage: 12 V

  • Fuel: Diesel compliant with EN590

  • Heating Power: 8 kW

  • Hot Air Flow: 55 m3/h

  • Fuel Consumption: 0.35 - 0.78 L/hour

  • Power Consumption: 20-45 W

  • Operating/Storage Temperature: -30? to 55?

  • Operating Altitude: Up to 4300 m above sea level

  • CO2 Emissions: <10%

  • Heater Dimensions: 25 x 37 x 26.5 cm

The Set Includes:

description.name: Pet grooming tool 17.5 x 9.5cm
description.long_desc:
We present a pet trimmer - a comb for knots- making it easier to care for your pet's fur. This is an ideal tool for owners of dogs and cats with long or medium hair that tends to tangle.


Product features and functions:



  • Effective combing of tangles: The comb has been designed to gently but effectively remove tangles and knots in the coat, without causing discomfort to the animal.

  • Ergonomic shape: Dimensions of 17.5 x 9.5 cm ensure a comfortable hand hold, making work easier even during longer grooming.

  • Safe for animal skin: The trimmer has rounded teeth that gently untangle the fur without irritating your pet's skin.

  • High quality workmanship: Durable materials guarantee long-term use, and specially designed blades allow for easy cutting of mats.

  • Ease of use: Ideal for regular coat care, which helps keep it healthy and aesthetically pleasing, preventing painful tangles.

description.name: Scraper with profliled edges and with bits
description.long_desc:
The contoured paint scraper is a multifunctional tool that combines versatility and functionality, essential for both painting and finishing tasks. The blade, made from high-quality chrome-vanadium steel (CrV) 3Cr13 with a hardness of 44-49 HRC, ensures durability and precision when removing paints, wallpapers, grout, or putty. The contoured head allows for scraping in hard-to-reach areas, and additional features like opening cans or cleaning rollers enhance the tool's usefulness.


The ergonomic, dual-composite handle provides a secure and comfortable grip, making work much easier. A built-in compartment for a set of four 1/4" bits in the handle is an added benefit of this tool. The handle is also equipped with a bit holder, giving the scraper the additional function of a handy screwdriver for quickly tightening or loosening screws.


Product features:



  • High-quality blade: CrV 3Cr13 steel with a hardness of 44-49 HRC ensures durability and efficiency during intensive work.

  • Ergonomic dual-composite handle: A secure and comfortable grip minimizes fatigue during prolonged use.

  • Built-in bit storage: A practical compartment in the handle for a set of four 1/4" bits, making the tool versatile and practical.

  • Bit holder in the handle: The scraper can function as a screwdriver, increasing its functionality.

  • Multifunctional head: Allows for scraping, opening cans, cleaning rollers, and more.


Applications:


The contoured paint scraper with bits by Geko is a versatile tool for a wide range of renovation and finishing tasks. It is perfect for removing paint, wallpaper, grout, and cleaning surfaces and painting tools. Thanks to the added screwdriver function, this tool is ideal for both professionals and DIY enthusiasts who appreciate convenience and multifunctionality in their tools.

description.name: Glue gun 150W with power regulation
description.long_desc:
A hot glue gun that meets the expectations of every DIY enthusiast and craftsman! The Keltin brand hot glue gun is the ideal choice for precision work requiring strong material bonding. Designed for 11 mm diameter glue sticks, this gun features adjustable temperature control ranging from 100 to 220°C, allowing you to tailor the settings to different types of glue and materials.


With a heating power of 150W, it heats up quickly in just 3-5 minutes, so you can get to work right away. The 150 cm long power cord provides freedom of movement, and the practical foldable stand ensures safe placement of the gun during breaks.


A solid construction, ergonomic handle, and precise nozzle guarantee comfortable and efficient operation. Whether you're crafting, repairing household items, or tackling larger projects, this hot glue gun will handle any task!


Technical Specifications:


Power: 150W


Glue Stick Diameter: 11 mm


Heating Time: 3-5 min


Cable Length: 150 cm


Temperature Range: 100-220°C


Input Voltage: 220-240V

description.name: Foam gun long with lance 50cm
description.long_desc:
Foam Gun for Mounting Foams – Designed for precision and durability, this tool is ideal for professional and DIY insulation, sealing, and installation work. The aluminum body ensures a lightweight yet durable construction, providing comfort during extended use. Key components, such as brass fittings and a main valve with a PTFE ball, guarantee excellent sealing and extended tool lifespan.


The PTFE coating on the gun's surface prevents foam from sticking, making cleaning and maintenance significantly easier. The lightweight plastic handle fits comfortably in hand, allowing for effortless use even during long working hours.


A precise foam adjustment knob enables accurate control of the foam flow, ensuring maximum efficiency and material savings. With its 50 cm length, this foam gun easily reaches hard-to-access areas, expanding its range of applications.


Technical Specifications:



  • Brand: Geko

  • Material: Brass, aluminum, plastic

  • Coating: PTFE (prevents foam adhesion)

  • Length: 50 cm

  • Handle: Lightweight plastic

  • Main valve: PTFE ball (for airtight sealing and durability)

  • Foam adjustment knob: Precise and user-friendly


This foam gun combines durability, precision, and comfort, making it the perfect tool for demanding insulation and sealing projects.

description.name: PU foam gun (blister)
description.long_desc:
Made from a combination of brass, stainless steel, aluminum, and plastic, this tool guarantees exceptional durability and resistance to mechanical damage. The PTFE coating gives the gun non-stick properties, preventing foam from adhering to the surface and significantly simplifying cleaning.

The lightweight yet robust construction ensures comfort during use, even during prolonged tasks. Its 32 cm length allows for precise foam application in hard-to-reach areas, which is crucial for insulation, sealing, or installing doors and windows.

The adjustable foam flow control lets you regulate the amount of material being dispensed, resulting in reduced waste and greater control over the work. The ergonomic handle offers a secure grip and comfortable use, which is especially important during intensive installation work.

Length: 32 cm

description.name: Washing gun with adaptors - vacuum cleaner
description.long_desc:
Looking for an effective solution for cleaning car upholstery, furniture upholstery, or carpets?
This cleaning gun allows for thorough cleaning of fabric and velour upholstery, floor mats, carpets, and even hard-to-reach areas. The bristle nozzle effectively removes dirt, while the included transparent water-extraction attachment enables quick surface drying.


Key Product Features:




  • Wide working pressure range: 6–9.2 bar




  • Low air consumption: only 270 l/min




  • Large detergent tank: 1000 ml




  • Standard pneumatic connection: 1/4”




  • Comprehensive set of vacuum cleaner adapters




Universal vacuum cleaner adapters


The set includes adapters compatible with most household and professional vacuum cleaners. An additional flexible hose and adapters make it easier to connect to extraction systems, enhancing comfort and cleaning efficiency.


Set Contents:




  • GEKO cleaning gun with 1L container




  • Bristle nozzle (for scrubbing)




  • 3 vacuum cleaner adapters in various diameters




  • Transparent nozzle for water extraction




  • Flexible hose for vacuum cleaner connection




  • Original packaging




Applications:




  • Cleaning car upholstery




  • Washing upholstered furniture




  • Cleaning carpets, rugs, and mattresses

  • Cleaning carpets, rugs, and mattresses
description.description:
Looking for an effective solution for cleaning car upholstery, furniture upholstery, or carpets?
This cleaning gun allows for thorough cleaning of fabric and velour upholstery, floor mats, carpets, and even hard-to-reach areas. The bristle nozzle effectively removes dirt, while the included transparent water-extraction attachment enables quick surface drying.


Key Product Features:




  • Wide working pressure range: 6–9.2 bar




  • Low air consumption: only 270 l/min




  • Large detergent tank: 1000 ml




  • Standard pneumatic connection: 1/4”




  • Comprehensive set of vacuum cleaner adapters




Universal vacuum cleaner adapters


The set includes adapters compatible with most household and professional vacuum cleaners. An additional flexible hose and adapters make it easier to connect to extraction systems, enhancing comfort and cleaning efficiency.


Set Contents:




  • GEKO cleaning gun with 1L container




  • Bristle nozzle (for scrubbing)




  • 3 vacuum cleaner adapters in various diameters




  • Transparent nozzle for water extraction




  • Flexible hose for vacuum cleaner connection




  • Original packaging




Applications:




  • Cleaning car upholstery




  • Washing upholstered furniture




  • Cleaning carpets, rugs, and mattresses

description.long_desc:

description.name: Spray gun HVLP - 4 nozzles( 1.3-1.4-1.-2.0)
description.long_desc:
A reliable tool for painting. The HVLP spray gun with interchangeable nozzles is the perfect solution for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike. Thanks to the advanced HVLP technology (High Volume Low Pressure), it ensures even surface coverage with minimal paint consumption.

  • Manufacturer: Geko
  • Nozzle Type: HVLP
  • Nozzle Size: 1.3mm / 1.4mm / 1.7mm / 2.0mm – choose the appropriate size based on the type and viscosity of the paint.
  • Paint Container Capacity: 600 ml – an optimal capacity that allows for extended use without frequent refills.
  • Performance: 170-300 l/min – high efficiency for fast and effective painting.
  • Working Pressure: 3-4 bar – ideal for precise paint spraying.
  • Air Inlet: 1/4" – a standard connection compatible with most compressors.

The pressure generated by the compressor pushes the paint through the nozzle, dispersing it as a fine mist, which ensures a perfect finish on any surface.

The gun is equipped with 4 interchangeable nozzles, allowing it to be adapted to different types of paints and working conditions. The set also includes cleaning tools, making maintenance of the device easier.

The gun features 3 adjustments:

  1. Air Adjustment: Allows control of the amount of air supplied to the gun, enabling adjustment of pressure and spray speed.
  2. Paint Adjustment: Enables precise dosing of paint, which is crucial for achieving a perfect finish without streaks or drips.
  3. Spray Pattern Adjustment: Allows changing the width and shape of the paint spray, making it possible to paint both large surfaces and fine details with precision.

 

When using the gun, maintain a distance of 10 to 15 cm between the nozzle and the surface being painted.

After finishing work, disconnect the gun from the compressed air system and empty the container of any remaining paint or other material. The container should be thoroughly cleaned to remove all residue. It is also important to carefully clean the entire delivery system, as inadequate cleaning may negatively affect the quality of the paint spray.

The air nozzle should be cleaned with a brush soaked in solvent, but the entire gun should never be immersed in solvent. Clogged openings should not be cleaned with hard objects to avoid damage that could affect the spray performance. After cleaning the gun, it is recommended to apply a small amount of lubricant to the moving parts of the seals. The nozzle should be tightened in a way that prevents leaks while still allowing smooth needle movement.

description.name: Pole hedge trimmer
description.long_desc:
Discover convenience and efficiency with the John Gardener electric pole hedge trimmer. It is the ideal solution for precise shaping and trimming of even the tallest hedges. Thanks to the telescopic length adjustment (from 2.1 to 2.7 m) and lightweight construction (only 2.35 kg), working at height becomes incredibly easy, allowing you to reach places where traditional shears can't.



  • Brand: John Gardener

  • Material: aluminum, plastic, high-grade steel

  • Power: 550W

  • Voltage: 230V~50Hz

  • Cutting length: 55 cm

  • Cutting diameter: 20 mm

  • Adjustable tool length: 2.1 - 2.7 m

  • Adjustable head angle: from -45° to 90° (range 135°)

  • Device noise level: 101 dB

  • Weight: 2.35 kg

  • Certification: CE


Product features:


The key advantage of this tool is the powerful 550W motor and the high-grade steel blade with a 55 cm cutting length, which easily handles branches up to 20 mm in diameter. The counter-rotating blade system ensures cleaner, faster cuts, and the adjustable head angle (from -45° to 90°) gives you full control over the direction of your work.



  • Aluminum blade guide,

  • Counter-rotating blade system allows trimming shrubs on both sides of the blade,

  • Blades made of high-grade steel,

  • Lightweight and easy-to-use tool,

  • Easy and safe length adjustment,

  • A spot for hanging the power extension (prevents accidental disconnection from the extension cord),

  • Includes adjustable harness for comfortable use,

  • Head adjustment: 4 positions every 45°,

  • Plastic blade cover included,

  • Double safety switch.

description.name: LED workshop lamp 230V 15W with a magnet, hook and 5m cable
description.long_desc:
LED workshop lamp with a power of 15W, designed for convenient and efficient lighting in work areas. With a durable plastic construction, a set of 100 LED lights, and practical features such as a magnet for attaching to metal surfaces and a hook for hanging, this lamp is ideal for use in workshops, garages, and service tasks. The long, 5-meter power cord provides flexibility, ensuring lighting exactly where it's needed.


Product Features:



  • Power: 15W, 100 LEDs providing bright illumination

  • Material: durable plastic

  • Mounting options: rear magnet and top hook for easy hanging

  • Power supply: 5-meter cable (230V)


Example Applications:


This lamp is perfect for illuminating hard-to-reach areas during car repairs in a workshop or assembly tasks in a garage. With the magnetic mount and hook, it can be securely placed on metal surfaces or hung, allowing for hands-free operation while you work.

description.name: Edge paint roller with a 2K roller frame - polyacrylic 10cm 30mm
description.long_desc:
Paint Roller with 2K Handle for Cutting In Colors – The Geko paint roller with a 2K handle is designed for precise color cutting and painting edges. Its compact 30 mm diameter and 100 mm length provide full control over paint application, while the ergonomic handle with a rubber coating ensures comfort during use. The high-quality polyacrylic cover allows for smooth and even paint distribution, minimizing streaks and drips.

30 mm roller diameter – ideal for precise painting of narrow surfaces and achieving perfect color cut-ins.
100 mm roller length – offers sufficient coverage for clean transitions between different painted surfaces.
6 mm handle diameter – ensures a stable and secure roller attachment.
Total length of 29 cm – allows easy maneuvering, even in corners and tight spaces.
Comfortable rubber-coated handle – reduces hand fatigue and provides a secure grip for full control during use.
Polyacrylic surface – guarantees smooth and even paint coverage, reducing the risk of streaks and drips.
Technical Specifications:
Brand: Geko
Roller diameter: 30 mm
Roller length: 100 mm
Handle diameter: 6 mm
Total length: 29 cm
Cover material: Polyacrylic
Handle: Ergonomic, rubber-coated
Perfect for detailed and precision painting tasks, the Geko paint roller ensures clean, professional results with maximum comfort and control.

description.name: Utility knife 100x18x0.5mm EASYGRIP SK2H – display box
HSS M3 x 0.5mm tapping drill with HEX mount
description.long_desc:
Looking for a quick, precise, and durable way to make threaded holes? A tap drill bit is the perfect solution for both professionals and DIY enthusiasts. The HSS M3 x 0.5 mm tap drill bit with a 1/4” HEX shank allows you to drill and thread in one go – no need to change tools!


Key product features:



  • Thread size: M3 x 0.5 mm

  • Type: Combination tap drill bit

  • Material: High-quality High Speed Steel (HSS)

  • Application: Suitable for metal, aluminum, plastic, and synthetic materials

  • Shank: 1/4” HEX (6.35 mm) – fits most screwdrivers, quick-change chucks, and magnetic bit holders

  • Coating: Titanium (TiN) – increases wear and heat resistance

  • Precision: Ideal for accurate drilling and threading even in hard-to-reach areas


Why choose this drill bit?



  • Drilling + threading in one step – saves time and improves workflow

  • Exceptional durability – HSS with titanium coating ensures long life

  • Versatility – compatible with standard chucks and screwdrivers

  • Precision craftsmanship – perfect for fine mechanical work and electronics

  • Ergonomic and reliable – ideal tool for workshops, service centers, manufacturing, and home use

description.name: 360 degree piezo gas burner with tank
description.long_desc:
The gas torch is a functional tool, ideal for tasks requiring a precise, controlled flame. Equipped with an integrated piezoelectric igniter, it provides quick and easy ignition without the need for matches or lighters. Its compact design and ability to work in any position (360°) make it highly portable and versatile. The torch has a power output of 0.2 kW, and thanks to its adjustable flame control, you can tailor its intensity to your needs. The integrated gas tank can be easily refilled, similar to standard lighters, ensuring convenience and long-lasting use.


Product characteristics:



  • Handy and compact design The torch’s lightweight, ergonomic build makes it easy to operate and fits perfectly in hand, allowing for long work sessions without fatigue. Its small size makes it easy to store and transport, so you can always have it within reach.

  • Torch power: 0.2 kW With a power of 0.2 kW, the torch provides the performance needed for a variety of tasks such as soldering, melting metals, or shrinking heat-shrink tubes. The right amount of power allows for quick heating, increasing work efficiency.

  • Integrated piezoelectric igniter The built-in piezoelectric igniter allows easy and quick activation of the torch with a single button press, eliminating the need for external fire sources such as matches or lighters. This ensures convenience and work safety.

  • Smooth flame size adjustment The user has full control over the flame size, allowing precise adjustment of the fire intensity for various tasks, from delicate jobs like modeling to more demanding operations such as soldering or welding.

  • Refillable gas tank The integrated, refillable gas tank makes the torch extremely convenient to use. It can be easily refilled with gas, just like a standard lighter. The tank is sealed and safe, ensuring long operation without frequent refills.

  • 360° operation capability The torch can be used at any angle, even upside down, making it an exceptionally versatile tool. The ability to work in a 360° position is highly useful when working in hard-to-reach places such as corners or narrow spaces.

  • Low gas consumption – 13.1 g/h The torch has very low gas consumption, allowing for longer work without frequent fuel refills. Its energy efficiency makes it a cost-effective solution for everyday tasks.

  • Solid and durable construction Made from high-quality materials that ensure long tool life. The housing is resistant to mechanical damage and high temperatures, making the torch a durable and reliable tool even in harsh working conditions.

  • Safety system – ignition lock The torch is equipped with an ignition lock feature that prevents accidental activation. This additional safety measure provides greater control over usage and minimizes the risk of unwanted accidents.

  • Wide range of applications The torch is ideal for various tasks, including soldering, welding, burning, paint removal, defrosting locks or pipes, and even in the kitchen for caramelizing sugar on desserts. Thanks to its versatility, it is suitable for both professional workshops and home use.


Applications:


The Geko gas torch is perfect for numerous applications, such as soldering, heating, melting, paint removal, or other tasks requiring high temperatures. It is ideal for both professionals and hobbyists who need a precise heat source. Thanks to its compact design and ability to work at any angle, this tool is essential in workshops, garages, and for home projects.

description.name: Piezo gas with a long burner and ignition
description.long_desc:
The 1.1kW gas torch is designed for convenience, precision, and versatility. With its long nozzle and built-in piezoelectric igniter, this torch is incredibly easy to operate and ensures safe and effective use in many applications. The device is powered by standard 400 ml/227 g gas cartridges, which can be quickly and securely attached using a TWIST-type connection, ensuring fast and reliable mounting.


The torch features a knob for precise flame adjustment, allowing you to tailor the power to the specific task at hand.


Technical Specifications:



  • Maximum Flame Temperature: 1300°C

  • Power: 1.1 kW

  • Gas Consumption: 80 g/h

  • Piezoelectric Igniter: Yes

  • Flame Size Adjustment: Yes


Product Features:




  • Long Nozzle: Makes it easy to reach difficult spots and keeps a safe distance from the flame source, enhancing work safety.




  • Built-in Piezoelectric Igniter: Allows for quick and convenient flame ignition without the need for external ignition sources, making operation easier and safer.




  • Flame Adjustment Knob: Enables precise adjustment of flame power for various applications, enhancing the device’s versatility and effectiveness.




  • 400 ml/227 g Gas Cartridge Compatibility: The torch is compatible with popular gas cartridges.




  • TWIST-Type Connection: Quick and easy connection of gas cartridges thanks to the intuitive TWIST system, ensuring secure mounting and safety during use.




Example Applications:




  • Workshops and Renovation Tasks: Ideal for soldering, welding, metal heating, paint removal, and other tasks requiring a strong heat source.




  • Plumbing: Essential for soldering copper pipes or heating installation components.




  • Gastronomy: Perfect for caramelizing sugar, preparing desserts like creme brulée, and quickly heating or toasting foods.




  • Home DIY: Useful in home repairs, such as defrosting frozen pipes, lighting a grill, or removing old paint.




  • Tourism and Camping: A reliable tool for quickly starting a fire.

description.name: Paint Thickness Gauge
description.long_desc:
A paint thickness gauge is an advanced tool used for precise measurement of coating thickness on metal surfaces. It features a clear, backlit LCD display that allows for easy reading of measurement results, even in low light. This tool is designed for precision, versatility, and ease of use, making it an ideal choice for both professionals and hobbyists.


The gauge offers three probe working modes: automatic (AUTO), magnetic induction (F) for measuring on ferromagnetic surfaces, and eddy currents (NFE) for non-magnetic surfaces. This enables accurate measurements on various material types, making it a versatile tool.


Technical Specifications:



  • Probe Modes: automatic (AUTO), magnetic induction (F), eddy currents (NFE)

  • Measurement Units: micrometers (µm), millimeters (mm), mils (mil)

  • Measurement Range: 0-2000 µm

  • Power Supply: 2x AAA battery

  • Additional Functions: measurement statistics, automatic shut-off

  • Set Contents: paint gauge, calibration plate, and 6 foil pieces of varying thickness


Product Features:




  • Backlit LCD Display: The large, backlit screen makes it easy to read measurement results, both in dark conditions and outdoors in bright light.




  • 3 Probe Modes:



    • AUTO – automatic measurement mode adapts to the type of surface.

    • F – magnetic induction, for ferromagnetic surfaces (e.g., steel).

    • NFE – eddy currents, for non-magnetic surfaces (e.g., aluminum).




  • Three Measurement Units: The user can select one of three measurement units: micrometers (µm), millimeters (mm), or mils (mil), increasing the device’s versatility.




  • Measurement Range: The device allows for paint thickness measurement from 0 to 2000 micrometers (µm), making it suitable for checking both thin layers and thick coatings.




  • Measurement Statistics: The gauge displays measurement statistics, such as minimum, average, maximum coating thickness, the difference between them, and the number of measurements taken. This function enables quick comparison of results, providing a complete picture of coating thickness.




  • Automatic Shut-off: The device automatically turns off 3 minutes after the measurement is completed, saving energy and extending battery life.




  • Power Supply: The gauge is powered by two standard AAA batteries, providing long-lasting use.




Example Applications:




  • Quality Control in the Automotive Industry: Measuring paint thickness on car bodies to detect panel repairs or assess the condition of a vehicle’s paint coating before purchase or sale.




  • Paint Industry: Checking coating thickness on various metal surfaces to ensure compliance with quality standards.




  • Inspections in the Metal Industry: Measuring protective coatings on steel and aluminum structural components in construction and manufacturing industries.




  • Accident Diagnostics: Verifying if new layers of paint were applied to vehicles, which may indicate bodywork repairs after accidents.
description.short_desc:
A paint thickness gauge is an advanced tool used for precise measurement of coating thickness on metal surfaces. It features a clear, backlit LCD display that allows for easy reading of measurement results, even in low light. This tool is designed for precision, versatility, and ease of use, making it an ideal choice for both professionals and hobbyists.


The gauge offers three probe working modes: automatic (AUTO), magnetic induction (F) for measuring on ferromagnetic surfaces, and eddy currents (NFE) for non-magnetic surfaces. This enables accurate measurements on various material types, making it a versatile tool.


Technical Specifications:



  • Probe Modes: automatic (AUTO), magnetic induction (F), eddy currents (NFE)

  • Measurement Units: micrometers (µm), millimeters (mm), mils (mil)

  • Measurement Range: 0-2000 µm

  • Power Supply: 2x AAA battery

  • Additional Functions: measurement statistics, automatic shut-off

  • Set Contents: paint gauge, calibration plate, and 6 foil pieces of varying thickness


Product Features:




  • Backlit LCD Display: The large, backlit screen makes it easy to read measurement results, both in dark conditions and outdoors in bright light.




  • 3 Probe Modes:



    • AUTO – automatic measurement mode adapts to the type of surface.

    • F – magnetic induction, for ferromagnetic surfaces (e.g., steel).

    • NFE – eddy currents, for non-magnetic surfaces (e.g., aluminum).




  • Three Measurement Units: The user can select one of three measurement units: micrometers (µm), millimeters (mm), or mils (mil), increasing the device’s versatility.




  • Measurement Range: The device allows for paint thickness measurement from 0 to 2000 micrometers (µm), making it suitable for checking both thin layers and thick coatings.




  • Measurement Statistics: The gauge displays measurement statistics, such as minimum, average, maximum coating thickness, the difference between them, and the number of measurements taken. This function enables quick comparison of results, providing a complete picture of coating thickness.




  • Automatic Shut-off: The device automatically turns off 3 minutes after the measurement is completed, saving energy and extending battery life.




  • Power Supply: The gauge is powered by two standard AAA batteries, providing long-lasting use.




Example Applications:




  • Quality Control in the Automotive Industry: Measuring paint thickness on car bodies to detect panel repairs or assess the condition of a vehicle’s paint coating before purchase or sale.




  • Paint Industry: Checking coating thickness on various metal surfaces to ensure compliance with quality standards.




  • Inspections in the Metal Industry: Measuring protective coatings on steel and aluminum structural components in construction and manufacturing industries.




  • Accident Diagnostics: Verifying if new layers of paint were applied to vehicles, which may indicate bodywork repairs after accidents.

description.name: 6pcs HSS M3-M10 tapping drill bit set with a HEX mount
description.long_desc:
A complete tap drill bit set is the perfect solution for anyone who values precision, durability, and convenience. The set includes 6 tap drill bits that allow you to drill and thread holes in one step – no need to change tools! Made from high-quality High Speed Steel (HSS) and coated with titanium (TiN), these tools offer enhanced durability and wear resistance.


Sizes included:



  • M3 x 0.5 mm

  • M4 x 0.7 mm

  • M5 x 0.8 mm

  • M6 x 1.0 mm

  • M8 x 1.25 mm

  • M10 x 1.5 mm


Key product features:



  • Type: Combination tap drill bits

  • Material: High-quality High Speed Steel (HSS)

  • Application: Suitable for metal, aluminum, plastic, and synthetic materials

  • Shank: 1/4” HEX (6.35 mm) – compatible with most screwdrivers, quick-change chucks, and magnetic bit holders

  • Coating: Titanium (TiN) – improves resistance to wear and heat

  • Precision: Perfect for accurate drilling and threading, even in hard-to-reach areas


Why choose this tap drill bit set?



  • Drilling + threading in one step – saves time and increases work efficiency

  • Exceptional durability – HSS with titanium coating ensures long tool life

  • Versatile compatibility – fits standard chucks and screwdrivers

  • Precision craftsmanship – great for fine mechanical work and electronics

  • Ergonomic and reliable – the ideal tool set for workshops, repair services, production, and home use

description.name: 15pcs screw extractor set Cr-Mo
description.long_desc:
The professional broken bolt extractor set is designed for efficient and safe work in automotive repair shops, industrial workshops, and machinery repair companies. This set includes 15 extractors made of durable chromium-molybdenum steel (Cr-Mo), providing excellent resistance to stress and ensuring tool longevity even with heavy use.



  • Versatile size range: The set covers a broad range of sizes, allowing for effective removal of broken bolts in various industrial applications.

  • Durable Cr-Mo steel: Made with chromium-molybdenum steel, these tools are exceptionally resistant to intensive use and provide long-lasting performance.

  • Safety and user comfort: The HEX grip ensures a secure and stable hold, minimizing the risk of the extractor slipping off damaged bolts.

  • Practical locking case: Provides easy storage and transport for the extractors.


Technical Specifications:



  • Brand: Tvardy

  • Material: Cr-Mo steel – offers high wear resistance and resistance to deformation, especially with seized bolts

  • Extractor sizes:

    • HEX 12 mm: 1/8", 3, 4, 3/16", 5, 5.5, 1/4", 6, 8, 3/8", 10

    • HEX 16 mm: 11, 12

    • HEX 20 mm: 1/2", 14



  • Grip: HEX – for secure seating of extractors in tools, providing a reliable hold during work

  • Contents: 15 extractors, carrying case


With its wide size range, this set is ideal for use with mechanical components in cars, construction machinery, and agricultural equipment.

description.name: 26pcs screws, nuts and studs extractor set
description.long_desc:
The 26-piece Geko extractor set is a professional tool designed for demanding applications in automotive, industrial, and construction workshops. Made from high-quality chrome-molybdenum steel (CrMo), it ensures exceptional durability, resistance to heavy loads, and precise performance.

Made from CrMo steel (chrome-molybdenum) for durability and damage resistance
26 components included, such as sockets, drill bits, extractors, an adapter, and nut splitters
Sockets ranging from 1/4" to 3/4" (19 mm), compatible with 3/8" drivers
Drill bits in sizes from 3/32" to 9/32"
Extractors in sizes from 3 mm to 10 mm for removing damaged screws
Nut splitters for diameters of O 2 cm and O 3 cm, enabling quick and safe removal of seized nuts
Durable case for organized storage and transportation
Versatile applications for automotive, industrial, and construction workshops
Technical Specifications:
Manufacturer: Geko
Material: CrMo steel (chrome-molybdenum)
Number of components in the set: 26 (sockets, drill bits, extractors, adapter, nut splitters)
Socket sizes: From 1/4" to 3/4" (19 mm)
Drill bit sizes: From 3/32" to 9/32"
Extractor sizes: From 3 mm to 10 mm
Additional accessories:
Adapter 3/8"-1/4"
Nut splitters O 2 cm and O 3 cm
Packaging: Durable case for storage and transport

description.name: 2pcs 26-28mm shank hss twist drill set
description.long_desc:
The set of metal drill bits with diameters of 26 mm and 28 mm are high-quality tools made from durable HSS 4241 high-speed steel, ensuring precise and fast drilling in hard materials. Thanks to the special 135° ground point, these drill bits provide effective centering and minimize the risk of slipping off the material's surface. The 12 mm cylindrical shank allows for secure mounting in standard drill chucks.


Product features:



  • High-quality HSS 4241 steel: The drill bits are made from durable high-speed steel, ensuring long tool life and high resistance to wear.

  • 135° ground tip: Enables precise drilling without the tool slipping, which is especially important when working on hard surfaces.

  • Drill diameters: The set includes 26 mm and 28 mm diameter bits, allowing for the drilling of large holes in various materials.

  • 12 mm cylindrical shank: Ensures a secure and stable mounting in the drill chuck, providing safety and precision during operation.


Applications:


The HSS 4241 metal drill bits with diameters of 26 mm and 28 mm are ideal for drilling in hard materials such as steel, cast iron, non-ferrous metals, and plastics. They are perfect for use in professional mechanical workshops as well as during construction or installation work where precise, large holes in metal are required.

description.name: ALU deburring tool with replaceable HSS M2 blade
description.long_desc:
The Geko aluminum deburring tool with a replaceable HSS M2 blade is a precise and reliable tool designed for edge finishing and removing burrs from various materials such as metal, plastic, wood, or acrylic. Its compact and lightweight design, made of durable aluminum, makes it handy and comfortable to use, even during prolonged work. The high-quality rotary blade made of high-speed steel HSS M2 ensures effective and quick burr removal, significantly improving the quality of work.


Product features:



  • Compact design made from durable aluminum

  • Replaceable rotary blade made of high-quality HSS M2 high-speed steel, offering long life and cutting efficiency

  • Ergonomic handle with a clip for easy portability and access to the tool at any time


Applications:


The aluminum deburring tool with a replaceable HSS M2 blade is ideal for precisely removing burrs from edges after cutting pipes, sheets, plastic parts, wood, or composite materials. It is indispensable in production plants, mechanical workshops, and in tasks related to plumbing and electrical installations. Thanks to the high-quality blade and durable construction, the deburring tool performs excellently in professional applications as well as in everyday DIY tasks.
